context_screenmodel:
This screen list some investing styles which are overarching strategies or theories used by  investors to set asset allocation and choose individual securities for investment. Investing styles will typically account for the investor's risk tolerance, their investment time horizon, ethical values, and other considerations

Style: select an investing style

Mentor: select an investor associated to  selected investing style.

Each strategy listed is associated to an investor, portfolio manager and we provide the source where  to retrieve the details of the strategy.

Moreover we provide a synthesis of each strategy in video.
dataanalysis_profile: This screen shows the company profile
